mapper.sql: ub.df_usage_batch_uid, ub.name, ub.rro_account_number, r.name rro_name, ub.product_family, ub.payment_date, ub.fiscal_year, ub.gross_amount, ub.fund_pool, ub.created_datetime, ub.updated_datetime, ub.created_by_user, ub.updated_by_user, ub.record_version
mapper.select: select distinct fiscal_year from ${schema}.df_usage_batch where product_family = #{productFamily} order by fiscal_year

select
from ${schema}.df_usage_batch ub left join ${schema}.df_rightsholder r on r.rh_account_number = ub.rro_account_number order by ub.updated_datetime desc

select
from ${schema}.df_usage_batch ub left join ${schema}.df_rightsholder r on r.rh_account_number = ub.rro_account_number where ub.product_family = #{productFamily} order by ub.updated_datetime desc
select count(name) from ${schema}.df_usage_batch where upper(name) = upper(#{name})

select
from ${schema}.df_usage_batch ub left join ${schema}.df_rightsholder r on r.rh_account_number = ub.rro_account_number where upper(ub.name) = upper(#{name})

with fund_pool_amounts as ( select ub.df_usage_batch_uid, ub.name, (ub.fund_pool->>'stm_amount')::numeric stm_amount, case when wc.classification = 'STM' then count(1) else 0 end stm_count, (ub.fund_pool->>'non_stm_amount')::numeric non_stm_amount, case when wc.classification = 'NON-STM' then count(1) else 0 end non_stm_count, case when wc.classification is null then count(1) else 0 end unclassified_count from ${schema}.df_usage_batch ub join ${schema}.df_usage u on ub.df_usage_batch_uid = u.df_usage_batch_uid left join ${schema}.df_work_classification wc on wc.wr_wrk_inst = u.wr_wrk_inst
group by ub.df_usage_batch_uid, ub.name, wc.classification )
select name from fund_pool_amounts
where stm_amount > 0 group by name having sum(stm_count) = 0
where non_stm_amount > 0 group by name having sum(non_stm_count) = 0
group by name having sum(unclassified_count) > 0
